data.oai_dc:dc: De-identified human subject data, Bayesian learner code and code to generate all figures. Code used to generate the significant difference markings on plots: Rob Campbell (2018). raacampbell/sigstar (https://www.github.com/raacampbell/sigstar), GitHub. Retrieved November 13, 2018. Code used to generate the shaded error bars on plots: Rob Campbell (2018). raacampbell/shadedErrorBar (https://github.com/raacampbell/shadedErrorBar), GitHub. Retrieved November 20, 2018.
